content: The US Source of Payment typology (SOP) code system, once managed by PHDSC, is now managed by NAHDO. As of last week, they have provided a permalinked url as the canonical uri. It is https://nahdo.org/sopt

@Robert McClure we need an external terminologies - information page for this code system. We can create the HTA confluene page stub if you can fill in the information, including the URL you've noted here and anything else you know about the code system. We can also use that information to start the "Using US Source of Payment (SOP) in FHIR" page. WIthout this information documented in known and consistent places, we won't have consistent implementation.
@Reuben Daniels @Julie James

I've created the stub (couldn't help myself)...there are a few blanks that I'd welcome anyone's help with filling in. @Reuben Daniels , can you start the process to create the related FHIR page.

https://confluence.hl7.org/display/TA/Source+of+Payment+Typology
